tool.name: Otu.association
tool.description: Calculate the correlation coefficient for the otus
tool.command: mothur_wrapper.py --cmd='otu.association' --result='^mothur.\S+\.logfile$:'$logfile,'^\S+\.norm\.shared$:'$shared --outputdir='$logfile.extra_files_path' --datasetid='$logfile.id' --new_file_path='$__new_file_path__' --new_datasets='^\S+?\.otu.corr$:$tabular' #if isinstance($otu.datatype, $__app__.datatypes_registry.get_datatype_by_extension('shared').__class__): --shared="$otu" #elif isinstance($otu.datatype, $__app__.datatypes_registry.get_datatype_by_extension('relabund').__class__): --relabund="$otu" #end if #if $label.__str__ != "None" and len($label.__str__) > 0: --label='$label' #end if #if $groups.__str__ != "None" and len($groups.__str__) > 0: --groups="$groups" #end if #if $method.__str__ != "None" and len($method.__str__) > 0: --method="$method" #end if #if $metadata.__str__ != "None" and len($method.__str__) > 0: --metadata="$metadata" #end if #if $cutoff.__str__ != '': --cutoff="$cutoff" #end if

param.name: otu
param.label: shared,relabund - OTU Shared or Relabund file

param.name: metadata
param.label: metadata - find the association between the otus and the metadata.

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documenation**
The otu.association_ command calculates the correlation coefficient for the otus in a shared_ or relabund_ file.
.. _shared: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Shared_file .. _relabund: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Get.relabund .. _otu.association: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Otu.association
v.1.25.0: Updated to mothur 1.33, added cutoff option
